sentences.english: The electrical connection in the photoelectrics levator involves electronics.

sentences.english: In this paper, how to construct the microelectronics specialty laboratory in non-key colleges or universities is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对非重点高校微电子学专业实验室建设进行了讨论。

sentences.english: These devices themselves and the techniques of designing such devices have been now the hot research topics in the field of micro-nano-electronics.
sentences.chinese: 器件和器件设计技术是微纳电子学的一个研究热点。

sentences.english: Optoelectronics & information industry was founded quite early in Wuhan.
sentences.chinese: 光电子学与消息产业建立相当早正在武汉。

sentences.english: It would be a natural evolution of microelectronics to become nanoelectronics.

sentences.english: Many efforts have been made to develope silicon based optoelectronics.
sentences.chinese: 近来人们对发展硅基光电子学作出了很大的努力。

sentences.english: Si-based optoelectronics will be one of the main topics in the optoelectronics research area in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 硅基光电子学无疑是今后光电子学发展的方向。

sentences.english: Si-based optoelectronics will be one of the main topics in the optoelectronics research area in the near future.

sentences.english: The foundation of microelectronics is modern solid state physics .
sentences.chinese: 微电子学的基础是近代固体物理。

sentences.english: He has lots of original ideas about the research into microelectronics.
sentences.chinese: 他对微电子学的研究很有创见。

sentences.english: Electronics level 1 has been added to the Minmatar Military career path.
sentences.chinese: 电子学1级已经被加入到米玛塔尔军事职业的生涯中。

sentences.english: The TV that be the same as manage also is same, this is called in electronics " syntonic " .
sentences.chinese: 同理电视也是一样，这在电子学中称为“谐振”。

sentences.english: Three-dimensional microelectronics focuses on the design and fabrication technology for 3-D integrated circuits.
sentences.chinese: 三维微电子学主要研究三维集成电路的设计与制造。

sentences.english: This result is very important to the application of nanoscale electronic device.
